abbot.tester

Class FailedException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • abbot.tester.FailedException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ActionFailedException, CallTimoutFailedException, WaitTimedOutException

    public class FailedException
extends java.lang.RuntimeException
    An exception to note that a process has failed in Abbot and we want to presever the system state.
    See Also:

        public java.lang.String getSystemState()
        Returns:
        The a string which represents the state of the system at the time of the failure in particular thread conditions and the current swing tree.
